title: snowball
body: pls nerf  rito...snowball 2 OP 4 Melee Champz

replies.body: I agree. Played a ranged champion and their tanks just snowballed me from such a huge range. I had zero chance of a kill or survival. Better yet, please get rid of them. Basically, a meelee champ gets a dual ability of ranged champ as well (without being squishy)
